sentences.sContent: “We’ve had millions of transactions to date, and it’s not just geeky nerdy people, it’s everyday consumers,” he said.
sentences.sContent_eng: “We’ve had millions of transactions to date, and it’s not just geeky nerdy people, it’s everyday consumers,” he said.
sentences.sCn: “目前我们已经有几百万美元的交易，这不只是令人讨厌的呆板的人，是普通的消费者，”他说。
